data.text:
About Karan Singh Grover /Personal Life :

Karan Singh Grover is an Indian Hindi television actor who was born on 23rd February 1982 in New Delhi,India.He belongs to a Punjabi Sikh family.He has done his schooling from Dammam,Saudi Arabia.He completed his graduation in Hotel Management from IHM Mumbai, Dadar Catering College.He also worked at the Sheraton Hotel.

In 2008,Karan got married to Shraddha Nigam but their relation could not even last for a year and got divorced.He was also linked with his "Jhalak Dikhla Jaa" choreographer Nicole Alvares.In 2012,Karan married his co-star Jennifer Winget from Kasautii Zindagii Kay & Dil Mil Gaaye.The couple got divorced in November 2014.Currently the actor is single and rumours are that Karan is dating actress Bipasha Basu.

Career :

Karan started his acting career with Gladrags Mega Model Manhunt contest in 2004 and also won the award for'Most Popular Model'.He made his television debut with Ekta Kapoor's show Kitni Mast Hai Zindagi which aired on MTV India.In 2005,he got an opportunity to work again in Ekta Kapoor's Kasautii Zindagii Kay as Sharad Gupta on Star Plus.He became popular for playing the role of Dr. Armaan Mallik in Star One's Dill Mill Gayye.Later he was seen in one episode of Star Plus Teri Meri Love Stories and as Professor Karan Mallik in MTv Dil Dosti Dance.In 2013,he was roped in Zee Tv's Qubool Hai as Asad Ahmed khan which was produced by produced by 4 Lions Films.

Karan Singh Grover as an Host :

Karan Singh Grover has hosted three television Non-fiction shows. He hosted a Dance Show Zara Nachke Dikha (2008) on Star One.In the year 2011 he hosted a show Perfect Couple which aired on Channel V.In 2014 he hosted Star Holi Masti Gulal Ki.

Karan Singh Grover in Reality Shows :

In the year 2009 the actor has participated in a dance show Jhalak Dikhhla Jaa (Season 3) as a 2nd Runner Up which aired on Colors channel.He was one of the contestants in Fear Factor: Khatron Ke Khiladi(2010)
